helper.moneyLaunderingContent: The process of making illegally obtained proceeds appear legal,typically involving three main stages: placement, layering, and integration.
helper.placementContent: The initial stage where unlawfully acquired funds are introduced into legitimatefinancial institutions through methods like deposits or other channels.
helper.layeringContent: The stage in which the origin of criminal proceeds is obfuscated through a series ofcomplex financial transactions, such as converting cash into traveler's checks, money orders,wire transfers, letters of credit, stocks, bonds, or acquiring assets.
helper.integrationContent: The final step involves using lawful transactions to disguise illicit funds, allowingthe laundered money to be reintroduced into the regular economy, thus concealing its illicitorigins.
helper.aMLPolicyContent: BONENZA. acknowledges that providing onlinegaming services carries inherent risks of money laundering and terrorist financing. To identify,prevent, and mitigate these risks, BONENZA. has implemented measures, processes, andinternal controls in its daily operations. These measures consider the nature of BONENZA.'sclients and the services it offers. By implementing these controls, BONENZA. complies withall legal requirements related to preventing money laundering and terrorist financing, asmandated by relevant Curacao legislation.
helper.establishedPolicy: BONENZA has established an AML Policy
helper.establishedPolicyContent: aimed at detecting, preventing, and reportingany attempts to use its services for transactions meeting the legal definition of moneylaundering, terrorist financing, or any other form of illicit financial activity. The AML Policy isregularly updated to align with changing legislation and industry best practices. Its contentsinclude:
helper.establishedPolicy1: Organizational processes related to preventing money laundering.
helper.establishedPolicy2: Due diligence procedures (also known as 'Know Your Customer' or KYC).
helper.establishedPolicy4: Identification of ineligible and eligible client categories.
helper.complyProcedures: To comply with Anti-Money Laundering (AML) procedures
helper.complyProceduresContent: a mandatory 1x wageringrequirement on all deposits is required before initiating a withdrawal request. Failure to meetthis requirement may result in withdrawal restrictions or denial until fulfilled. Once the one-time turnover requirement is satisfied, users can request withdrawals based on the profitsearned from their deposit. For example, if User A deposits $500, they must engage in wagerstotaling $500 to initiate a withdrawal. If User A subsequently earns a profit of $68 from this 1xwagering activity, their accurate withdrawal amount is $568. Users can engage in additionalwagering activities to accumulate further rewards.
helper.gameFair1: We are a fair and impartial prediction and guessing platform. Our goal is to eliminate all unfair factors and make players feel comfortable and have fun.
helper.gameFair2: We have generated a total of 10 million hashes (the generation chain is verifiable), and each hash corresponds to a Crash multiplier.
helper.gameFair3: We release these 10 million numbers in reverse order, each corresponding to one turn of the game (i.e. we have 10 million turns in total).
helper.gameFair4: In other words, the crash number of each turn already exists and is not calculated after the game starts. Players can therefore place their bet without concern.
helper.gameFair5: Will The Game Be Manipulated By The Platform?
helper.gameFair6: The integrity check value is key to verifying whether there is any official manipulation; The test algorithm is provided as follows.
helper.gameFair8: Take a random value in the 2^52 range, namely 16^13, i.e. a 13-bit hexadecimal number (because the hash value is hexadecimal, 2^52 === 16^13)6b5124897c3c4 (0x6b5124897c3c4 equals 1887939992208324 in the decimal system).
helper.gameFair9: Distribute the random value to 0~1, by dividing it by the maximum value of 13 fs, namely 0x6b5124897c3c4/0x10000000000000. Given the discrete random nature of the hash value, we then can think that any hash value can be transformed into a random number of 0~1, 1887939992208324/4503599627370496 = 0.419206889692064.
helper.gameFair10: Make the house edge 1%. Further to calculate 99/(1-X), where X is the random value calculated at Step 2. When X is 0, the result is 99; when X is 1, the result is positive infinite; when X is 0.01, the result is 100; when X is less than 0.01, the result is less than 100.
helper.gameFair11: Conclusion: The overall random number distribution is 99 to positive infinite; and when the random number distribution is 0~0.01, the result is less than 100.
helper.gameFair13: All values less than 100 will be set to 100. In other words, there is a probability of 1% that 100 will appear. Round off the number and divide it by 100 to get the final result.
helper.gameFair15: Conclusion: The hash value used in the game is inverse ordered. Therefore, with the SHA256 algorithm, a previous hash used in the game can be calculated from its subsequent hash. Since there is one-to-one correspondence between the key and the value of hash, we can draw the conclusion that if a hash can be used to calculate the hash that precedes it, then this hash should have been already generated when the preceding prize is announced. Similarly, the entire hash chain is generated at the very beginning and cannot be changed once generated. Otherwise, it cannot pass verification by SHA256, and as far as the payout is concerned, this is nothing more than a probability game in which crash is a given. The official organizer cannot manipulate any game set. Therefore, CRASH is more transparent than other gambling methods. This is the cornerstone on which our game is built.
helper.gameFair17: When the 13-bit hash value is 8000000000000 = 1.98, 0xb000000000 = 3.168, 0xc000000000 = 3.96, that is, the first digit is greater than 8((16-8)/16≈0.5), the result is approximately 2x; when the first digit is greater than b((16-11)/16≈0.3), the result is approximately 3x; and when the first digit is greater than c((16-12)/16≈0.25), the result is approximately 4x, and the same rule applies to the rest.

helper.cookiesPolicy2: A cookie is a piece of information in the form of a very small text file that is placed on an internet user's computer. It is generated by a web page server (which is basically the computer that operates the website) and can be used by that server whenever the user visits the site. A cookie can be thought of as an internet user's identification card, which tells a website when the user has returned. Cookies can't harm your computer and we don't store any personally identifiable information about you on any of our cookies.

helper.gambleWareContent1: Betting at an online casino is primarily done for recreational purposes. However, a small percentage of people experience a loss of control of themselves while gambling. Before beginning to play, it is critical to understand that gaming should not be regarded as a source of revenue or a means of debt repayment. It is beneficial to keep track of the amount of time and money spent at an online casino on a daily basis.
helper.gambleWareContent2: BONENZA only accepts players who are at least 18 years old and employs all applicable methods to prevent underage people from registering and playing at our casino. The casino holds the right to request identification, and if the player is not of legal gambling age, access to the website will be refused. However, we recognize that due to the widespread availability of the Internet, people under the age of 18 can still sign up and play at an online casino. As a result, we strongly encourage parents to work together to protect their children from free access to betting websites. There is specialized software available to assist in this situation. For more information, please see the websites listed below.

helper.selfExclusionRules2: 2. You may self-exclude for periods of 1, 3, 6, 12 month/s or permanent. Self-exclusion requests are to be made via Live Support.
helper.selfExclusionRules3: 3. Once you have self-excluded you will not be able to access your account or withdraw during this period.
helper.selfExclusionRules4: 4. If you have excluded your account whilst you have pending bets on your account, bets placed will remain valid and settle according to official results.
helper.selfExclusionRules5: 5. Once the period of self-exclusion has lapsed you may withdraw winnings from qualifying bets. BONENZA does not cancel or void any bets placed before a self-exclusion has been affected.
helper.selfExclusionRules6: 6. Once you have self-excluded you will not be able to change or alter the period for a shorter length of time or have your self-exclusion cancelled until the period that you selected for self-exclusion has passed.
helper.selfExclusionAgree1: You will not create another account during this period.
helper.selfExclusionAgree2: You will not deposit or attempt to deposit funds into a BONENZA account.
helper.selfExclusionAgree3: You will not wager on this website during this period.
helper.selfExclusionAgree4: This is a voluntary act initiated by yourself, and BONENZA. will not be liable for any losses you may incur during the period of self-exclusion in any form.
helper.depositBonusHowToClaimItem1Content: Sign up at BONENZA. On the right of the website, click the icon of “Deposit bonus”.
helper.depositBonusHowToClaimItem2Content: Go to the deposits page and make a deposit. Minimum Deposit $10.Get up to $20,000. The platform will give you a 300% deposit amount, and the bonus will be placed into the Rakeback.
helper.depositBonusHowToClaimItem3Content: The bonus placed into Rakeback will be unlocked based on wagering in casino and sports games. Rakeback will unlock bonus according to wager * 1% * 20%.
helper.depositBonusHowToClaimItem4Content: To claim the unlocked bonus, go to the bonus page, select "Rakeback," click on "unlock USDT," then click "claim" to withdraw the bonus to your wallet.
helper.depositBonusTermsDescription1: During the availability period of the deposit bonus promotion, completing a deposit will earn you an additional bonus. Users must make a deposit of a specified amount to qualify for the deposit bonus. The exact amount is prominently displayed in the deposit window.
helper.depositBonusTermsDescription2: The bonus amount obtained through the deposit bonus will be credited to Rakeback. As users wager, the bonus amount will be unlocked at a rate of wager * 1% * 20%, until the entire bonus is unlocked. To claim the unlocked bonus, it needs to reach an equivalent amount of $5.
helper.depositBonusTermsDescription3: In each round of the deposit bonus promotion, you can make up to 4 qualifying deposits to receive corresponding rewards:
helper.depositBonusTermsItem1: The first deposit earns you 180% (or 300% for new registrations within 7 minutes), up to a maximum of $20,000 or an equivalent amount in other currencies.
helper.depositBonusTermsItem2: The second deposit earns you 240%, up to a maximum of $40,000 or an equivalent amount in other currencies.
helper.depositBonusTermsItem3: The third deposit earns you 300%, up to a maximum of $60,000 or an equivalent amount in other currencies.
helper.depositBonusTermsItem4: The fourth deposit earns you 360%, up to a maximum of $100,000 or an equivalent amount in other currencies.
helper.depositBonusTermsFooter: BONENZA management reserve the right to void any bonuses and/or winnings obtained by fraudulent behavior.
helper.feeNecessaryHeader: Why do you need a Withdraw fee?
helper.feeNecessaryContent: When we make a transaction, the information is broadcast to the network, and the miners collect and package the production blocks, and only after the block is produced, the transaction is recognized.Although the miners will get a fixed monetary reward after digging into the block, according to the rules, the reward will gradually be halved and become less and less, and eventually the miners may not be profitable. Therefore, transaction fees are needed to maintain the enthusiasm of miners for mining.
helper.feeRoleHeader: The role of the Withdraw fee
helper.feeRoleItem2: Prevent excessive small transactions from hitting the network.Due to the P2P network, the ability of transaction processing is limited. If everyone frequently conducts small transactions, the network will be congested, causing delays or even stagnation. So set a threshold, the amount of natural transactions will be reduced when there is a small transaction.
helper.feePercentageHeader: How much is the Withdraw fee?
helper.feePercentageContent: Since the transaction is a two-way charge, it means that the sale of a digital currency requires at least a 0.1% Withdraw fee to the platform.
helper.googleAuthenticatorContent1: Google authenticator could provide an additional layer of security protection for your account. It is a software token that implements a 2-step verification program.In order to use Google authenticator, you must have a mobile phone because it will be installed as a mobile application.You can also use Google authenticator when offline.
helper.googleAuthenticatorContent2: Google authenticator uses an algorithm to calculate one-time passwords based on time. Simply put, once the application is started, Google authenticator will display a randomly generated 6-digit sequence of numbers, ie, a one-time password. If you have enabled 2FA in your account, then in addition to entering your usual password, you also need to enter the randomly generated one-time password. 2FA provides additional security protection because it makes sure that others cannot login to your account with your username and password alone.
helper.googleAuthenticatorContent3: We highly values the security of the players, so we strongly recommend you to use Google authenticator. This small extra step could protect you against necessary headache and anxiety.
helper.googleAuthenticatorContent4: If you have enabled Google authenticator, you will be prompted to complete 2FA every time you login or withdraw.Furthermore, please print out the QR code or write down the manual code that could recover your account.In case of mobile phone breakdown or loss, this will help you to a great extent.
helper.googleAuthenticatorContent5: To know more about Google authenticator.
helper.registrationContent1: You must be at least 18 years old to register. If you want to add your email address, please make sure the email address you entered is correct so that later it can be used in KYC account verification.
helper.registrationContent2: You can login at any time.For added security, we recommend you to add 2FA. To know more about Google authenticator.
helper.registrationContent3: If you need to change your registered email, we are so sorry, but we are not able to update this information. If you insist on changing your username and/or registered email, we suggest you close the current account and register a new one.
helper.supportContent1: You have a question? Can't find the answer on the website? Don't worry! you can contact our 24-hour online customer support any time.
helper.supportContent3: is happy to answer any of your questions.

helper.faqJourneyContent2: You must be at least 18 years old or reach the age of majority under your jurisdiction. You must be permitted to play online games by the laws applicable to you. For more information, please read our terms and conditions.
helper.faqJourneyContent3: Games might be addictive, and players are advised to be self-control.
helper.faqAccountQuestion1: What if I forget my password?
helper.faqAccountAnswer1: If you forget your password, you could reset it within 15 seconds through our “Forget password” link. After applying for password reset, please follow the instructions in the email we send to you to reset your password.
helper.faqAccountQuestion2: I have lost my mobile phone. How do I reset my Google authenticator?
helper.faqAccountAnswer2: If you want to remove your Google authenticator 2FA, please contact us. After we receive your application, for the safety of your account, you are required to answer several security questions correctly in order to remove the 2FA.
helper.faqAccountQuestion3: Can I change my username or registered email address?
helper.faqAccountAnswer3: Sorry, but we are not able to update this information. If you insist on changing your username and/or registered email, we suggest you close the current account and register a new one.
helper.faqAccountQuestion4: How do I become a VIP?
helper.faqAccountAnswer4: The exclusive VIP club is by invitation only. After you embark on your journey of the game, you will be notified of your VIP status by email soon.
helper.faqWalletContent: 『Wallet』 is part of the player account. You can view the balance of all cooperative cryptocurrencies, deposit and withdraw and query transaction records. Furthermore, you can also get access to BONENZA Swap without review.
helper.faqDepositContent1: Find the『My wallet』 page, click the deposit page, copy the wallet address, or scan QR code for payment.
helper.faqDepositContent2: Use Buy Crypto to deposit any supported currencies provided by MoonPay and Banxa.
helper.faqDepositContent3: Quickly deposit and withdrawal directly from the cooperative wallet.
helper.faqSwapContent: You can use BONENZA Swap to exchange cryptocurrencies without waiting for review.
helper.faqWithdrawContent: Find the『Wallet』page, open the withdraw page, enter the address of the wallet you need to withdraw and the amount of cryptocurrency (pay attention to the fee).
helper.faqMinimumWithdrawContent: Because the value of each cryptocurrency is different, the minimum Withdraw amount is also different
helper.faqPeriodHeader: How long does it take to deposit and withdraw?
helper.faqPeriodContent1: Each transaction on the blockchain requires several cycles to confirm the transfer has been recorded successfully.
helper.faqPeriodContent2: Generally speaking, each transaction requires 5-10 minutes before it can be confirmed by the blockchain network.
helper.faqPeriodContent3: If you encounter any problem during deposit or Withdraw, you can visit
helper.faqPeriodContent5: to check your transaction, or contact technical support.
helper.faqConfirmHeader: Before Withdraw, how many confirmations is required on my deposit?
helper.faqConfirmContent: At least 3 confirmations of your entire deposit are required before a withdrawal. You may check the current confirmation progress by clicking on the deposit link in the cashier page.
helper.faqTransactionConfirmHeader: Where do transaction confirmations come from?
helper.faqTransactionConfirmContent: All confirmation information comes from the wallet supplier, the blockchain and miners.
helper.faqTransactiionConfirmPeriodHeader: How long does it take to confirm a transaction?
helper.faqTransactiionConfirmPeriodContent: It depends on the blockchain and your transfer fee. It might take 10 minutes or several hours.
helper.faqFairHeader: Is your game fair and just?
helper.faqFairContent: We are based on the Ethereum smart contract. All data and core logic on the blockchain are transparent, and manipulation is not possible. Every single transaction on the blockchain can be tracked on etherscan. The fairness, openness, and justness of us gaming platform are guaranteed.
helper.faqWhenProblemOccursHeader: What should I do if my game hangs or there is a problem?
helper.faqWhenProblemOccursContent: If you encounter any technical problem while playing our games, please try to refresh the game. Normally it will work after refresh. Should the problem persist, please contact us.
helper.coinAccuracyHeader1: Fiat Currency Display for Cryptocurrency Players
helper.coinAccuracyContent1: Players who elect to view their cryptocurrency balances in terms of fiat currency equivalents ("Converted Balances") should expressly recognize that such Converted Balances are for reference purposes only and serve as approximate estimates. Although BONENZA endorses diligent efforts to ensure that the conversion rates utilized are accurate and updated, all transactions, wagers, and settlements conducted on our platform are denominated and settled in cryptocurrency.
helper.coinAccuracyContent2: BONENZA expressly disclaims any liability for inaccuracies, errors, or discrepancies in the Converted Balances presented. Players are hereby advised that the cryptocurrency amount shall be deemed the primary value for all transactions and wagers, and any reliance on estimated fiat conversions, known as Converted Balances, is at the sole risk of the player.
helper.coinAccuracyContent3: Our platform may integrate third-party games offering the display of fiat conversion options ("Third-Party Converted Balances"). BONENZA shall not be held accountable for any discrepancies between the Converted Balances shown on the website and the Third-Party Converted Balances presented within these third-party games.
helper.coinAccuracyContent4: We actively encourage players to promptly report any discrepancies or irregularities observed between the Converted Balances displayed and the actual cryptocurrency amounts. Such reporting should be directed to our support team for immediate review and action. Timely reporting assists us in the continuous improvement of player experience and the accuracy of information presented.
helper.coinAccuracyContent5: Due to the limitation of data storage accuracy, changes in the amount less than a certain amount will not take effect. The minimum accuracy of most coins is consistent with the currency accuracy of the blockchain. For example, the minimum unit of USDT is 0.0001. The minimum data storage accuracy of each coin is shown in the following table:
helper.currencyWhatIsContent1: Cryptocurrency is a digital currency that does not rely on any real substance and makes use of cryptography, eg. Bitcoin, Litecoin, BitShares, etc. It is a digital currency that is created, distributed, and maintained based on cryptography and validation technology. The characteristics of cryptocurrency are its application of P2P technology and the fact that everyone issues it.
helper.currencyWhatIsContent2: Cryptocurrency is also an online payment system that supports anonymous transactions. Bitcoin is the top cryptocurrency, and is recognised by the laws in many countries.
helper.currencyWhyUsingContent: Due to several reasons, crytocurrency is the most popular and widely used digital currency. In contrast to traditional transfer,Cryptocurrency transfers never require several hours of waiting, and are not affected by the transfer amount or the region of the user. The fee is also much lower, and is usually a few cents. Refund will not happen to cryptocurrency, and no cheating is possible. No bank, government agency, or individual could manipulate cryptocurrency. In contrast to traditional currency, cryptocurrency transactions are anonymous, and there is no threat of confiscation.
helper.currencyHowWorkContent: Cryptocurrency transactions are actually very simple. Basically it is to send cryptocurrency from an online wallet to another. The first step in the whole process is that the payer sends a private key (a randomly generated sequence of numbers) to the payee, after which a transaction will go through 0 to 5 validations. An ordinary transaction will go through 1 validation, but if the amount is very large, it is better to perform multiple validations. It takes about 10 minutes for a single validation on the blockchain network. After validation, anyone on the blockchain can check this transaction but could not see any sensitive information.
helper.currencyHowPurcahseContent1: Cryptocurrency can be purchased at the following places:
helper.currencyHowPurcahseContent2: Market exchange: If the buyer does not care much about privacy, then an online market exchange is the best option to buy cryptocurrency because market exchanges usually require the buyers to provide identification. Buyers could purchase cryptocurrency from a market exchange and store it there.
helper.currencyHowPurcahseContent3: Over the counter: This means two people perform a cryptocurrency transaction face-to-face. Usually cryptocurrency transactions are carried out anonymously between the two parties. Although the face-to-face approach does not enjoy this benefit, it is still very popular. Sellers and buyers could contact each other through many websites.
helper.currencyHowPurcahseContent4: Cryptocurrency ATM: These ATM are no different from normal ATM apart from that the buyer gets a receipt with a certain code instead of cash. By scanning the code, the bitcoin will be transferred to the buyer’s wallet.
helper.currencyLegalContent1: Simply put, the legal status of cryptocurrency is getting better. In the past few months, Japan announced to recognise bitcoin as a legal currency, and Russia also declared its plan to recognise bitcoin as a financial tool. This is a major change of stance for Russia, since bitcoin was originally banned in Russia.
helper.currencyLegalContent2: While cryptocurrency gradually becomes a strong and important global currency, this kind of change will also increase. The regulation on, use of, and taxation on cryptocurrency still vary across countries. On the other hand, new laws and rules are published all the time. If you wish to know in details about your government’s stance on cryptocurrency and potential changes in the future, please contact a legal consultant.
helper.currencyBitCoinWalletContent: There are many bitcoin wallet available. There are cloud-based wallets as well as wallets that can be downloaded to personal computers, tablet computers, or mobile phones. You can also get a physical hardware wallet that stores cryptocurrency. There is a common function among the various wallets, which is to transfer cryptocurrency, but each wallet has its own merit.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent1: When used properly, bitcoin is highly secure. Please always remember it is your responsibility to take measures to protect your money.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent2: You should consider the following points:
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent3: Like legal tender, do not put all your money in one wallet.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent4: Choose your online wallet carefully. 2FA is a good extra guarantee.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent5: Back up your wallet regularly. It is also a good practice to encrypt backups that are exposed to the Internet.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent6: Store the password in a secure location. You may memorise your password, or store it in a secure physical location.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent7: Choose a strong password that contains letters, numbers, and symbols, and is at least 16 characters long.
helper.currencyProtectWalletContent8: Offline wallet, also known as cold storage, provides the highest security for your deposit. It is to hide the wallet in a secure place that is not connected to the Internet. If implemented well, this option could provide excellent protection against computer vulnerabilities.
helper.responsibleAtBonenzaContent1: At BONENZA is strictly forbidden to play for people under 18 years old.
helper.responsibleAtBonenzaContent2: Online gambling is a fun, and potentially rewarding way to spend your time. However, we at BONENZA have our players’ best interests at heart. We support responsible gambling.
helper.responsibleAtBonenzaContent3: As online gambling has grown over the last decade, online gambling sites for casino, sports, lottery and other games have become easily accessible at a touch of a button. Anytime and anywhere. This makes it harder for players to set boundaries.
helper.responsibleAtBonenzaContent4: BONENZA casino section is designed to offer a maximized entertainment portal that is made for pure enjoyment. However, we wish for our gamblers to play within their means.
helper.responsibleKeepMind1: Gambling is intended as to be fun and entertaining as opposed to a means to an end to making money
helper.responsibleKeepMind2: Gambling is not a way to resolve financial difficulties.
helper.responsibleKeepMind3: Decide on a gambling budget and stick to it. Keep track of your spending and only play with the amount initially decided.
helper.responsibleKeepMind4: Do not chase after losses or play with money allocated to other areas of your budget.
helper.responsibleKeepMind5: Check that you are only playing in your free time allocated to hobbies. Gambling is not supposed to keep you from your routine daily activities. Monitor the time you spend gambling.
helper.responsibleCompulsiveDescription: According to Gamblers Anonymous, if you answer 7 or more of these with a yes, you should seek help for your gambling addiction.
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent2: Has gambling affected your home life negatively?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent3: Has your reputation been damaged from gambling?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent4: Have you ever felt remorse after gambling?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent5: Do you ever gamble to solve financial difficulties?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent6: Has gambling caused a decrease in your ambition or efficiency?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent7: Have you gambled, or carried on gambling, to win back your losses?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent8: After a win, do you have an urge to return and win more?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent9: Do you often gamble until your last money is gone?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent10: Do you ever borrow to finance your gambling?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent11: Have you ever sold anything to finance gambling?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent12: Are you reluctant to use "gambling money" for normal expenditures?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent13: Does gambling make you careless with the welfare of yourself or your family?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent14: Do you ever gamble longer than you had planned?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent15: Have you ever gambled to escape worries?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent16: Have you ever committed, or considered committing, an illegal act to finance gambling?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent17: Does gambling cause you to have difficulty sleeping?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent18: Do you get the urge to gamble when you are emotionally upset?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent19: Did you get the urge to gamble to celebrate any good fortune in your life?
helper.responsibleCompulsiveContent20: Have you ever contemplated self-harm or suicide as a result of your gambling?
helper.responsibleUnderAgeContent1: People under the age of 18 are strictly forbidden from gambling at BONENZA. We conduct random checks via payment portals used to deposit money. If players are found to be under 18 all winnings are forfeited, accounts closed, and police will be contacted in the country of the child's residence.
helper.responsibleUnderAgeContent2: We strongly advise parents to be fully aware and engaged in what activities their children use on gaming devices. It is also advisable to install software filters.
helper.responsibleUnderAgeContent3: Where To Get Help If You Feel You Have A Gambling Problem
helper.responsibleUnderAgeContent4: International Contact Details if you feel you need assistance is as follows:
helper.responsibleHelpWhat: What BONENZA Has In Place To Help Our Players
helper.responsibleHelpWhatContent1: To assist players in keeping within their limits, we always suggest that gamblers who enter throughout site always check for the following guidelines and tools on the casinos' site:
helper.responsibleHelpWhatContent3: A 24/7 support team to discuss concerns or queries on your problem
helper.responsibleHelpWhatContent4: We provide links to self-help information and organisations
helper.responsibleProtectContent1: If you cannot gamble responsibly, the only option is to not gamble at all. This way, you will avoid putting yourself and your loved ones at risk. Many people have ruined their lives by not adhering to signs of irresponsible gambling. By playing at BONENZA, you will have help at your fingertips at all times, and we will always welcome the communication and opportunity to help.
helper.responsibleProtectContent2: All casinos and games have a built-in RTP or return to player and a set house edge which has a favorable long-term outcome for the casino. In conclusion, it is important to remember that the money you are betting with should only be disposable income because gambling is about maximizing enjoyment and having fun. These are games of chance, and you may win, but you could equally lose.
helper.responsibleProtectContent3: Join BONENZA to have fun on games and have the support to stay on track.

vipClub.weeklyCashbackContent: Receive your weekly bonus of {{weeklyCashback}} approximately based on your wager amount.
vipClub.monthlyCashbackContent: Receive your monthly bonus of {{monthlyCashback}} approximately based on your wager amount.
vipClub.sportsWeeklyBonusContent: Additional rewards and benefits for sports bettors.
vipClub.vipHostContent: Enjoy on-demand service and exclusive benefits.
vipClub.exclusiveSVIPContent: Uncover unimaginable surprises as our Diamond VIP.
vipClub.luxuryGiveawayContent: Join for an exclusive chance to win marvelous surprises.
vipClub.vipHotToolTip: VIP Host is your exclusive customer support. Feel free to contact them any time.
vipClub.yourTip2: All wagers are converted to USD at the current rate
vipClub.exclusiveBenefitsContent: Join our VIP Club now and get ready to be showered with gifts, giveaways, and amazing features! Experience the thrill of higher cash back and exclusive rewards that are sure to leave you amazed.
vipClub.noFeeWithdrawalDescription: Unlock the No-fee withdrawal perks at VIP 38 and withdraw your winnings with ease and no additional charges.0,
vipClub.rewardluckyDescription: Spin the wheel and receive bigger prizes with our exciting Lucky Spin as you level up.
vipClub.dedicatedVipHostContent: Unlock the No-fee withdrawal perks at VIP 38 and enjoy your VIP host’s personalized attention and exclusive benefits.
vipClub.bonusContent: A surprise reward awaits and gets unlocked multiple times as you level up.
vipClub.tipRainingContent: Show appreciation with Tips, or get lucky with Coin Drops for a chance to win rewards.
vipClub.whatLevelBonusContent: Showcasing our appreciation for players, we reward them with a Level Up bonus upon reaching the next level. Once players reach Level 38 and higher, we have boosted the level-up bonus to be slightly higher than the regular level-up bonus available at lower levels.
vipClub.whatRainingContent1: Engage in chat conversations throughout the day to receive free coins as part of the Constant Chat Rains bonus.
vipClub.whatRainingContent2: 1. Six players level higher than 4 will be randomly selected and rewarded in chat room every 6 hours.
vipClub.whatRainingContent3: 2. Bonus will be different according to the currencies.
vipClub.whatRainingContent4: 3. Players will be randomly selected by Rain algorithm. The players who send more messages have the higher probability to get rewarded.
vipClub.whatRainingContent5: 4 But even if the user has sent only one message, there is still a chance that they can receive the rain bonus.
vipClub.whatRainingContent6: 5. Rain information will be sent to the chat room by robots.
vipClub.whatRainingContent7: 6. Having more than one account per user is prohibited. You will get the lower possibility of receiving rain and BONENZA will suspend your withdrawals for a manual review in the fraud prevention system which may take up to 24 hrs. We do not guarantee withdraw processing and may ban account with your balance in it. If you have already had more than one account please self-surrender by contacting Live Support.
vipClub.whatCoinDropContent1: If you haven’t reached VIP Level 7 and unlocked ‘Coin Drop’, you need to be active and quick in order to grab the coins when it happens in Public Chat. The rewards go to the fastest participants.
vipClub.whatCoinDropContent2: Once you have reached VIP Level 7, you may create your own ‘Coin Drop’ and customize the amount and quantity of recipients before you share your good luck and generosity with other players in Public Chat.
vipClub.whatTipsContent: You may tip other players once you reach VIP Level 8. Tipping is how you show appreciation and share your generosity with other players in BONENZA. You can decide how much you want to send to the other players.
vipClub.whatRechargeContent1: ‘Recharge’ is a unique and exciting feature that rewards players with split bonuses (Recharges) throughout the week based on their gaming activities. Players can set different intervals to claim these bonuses, providing them with an added incentive to keep playing. This article will guide you through everything you need to know about Recharge, including eligibility, how to claim, frequency options, calculation, and the latest updates to the Recharge reward structure.
vipClub.whatRechargeContent2: In basic terms, ‘Recharge’ means that players receive split bonuses (Recharges) throughout the week at different intervals set by the player themselves. This feature not only keeps players engaged but also adds an extra layer of excitement to the gaming experience.
vipClub.whatRechargeContent4: To be eligible for Recharge Activation, players must meet the following criteria:
vipClub.whatRechargeContent5: 1.Have a VIP level of 22 and above
vipClub.whatRechargeContent6: 2.Have wagered a minimum of $1,000 in the past 7 days (24/7)
vipClub.whatRechargeContent7: Once a player meets these requirements, they can request Recharge Activation. Upon activation, their Recharge will be redeemable for the next 7 days.
vipClub.whatWeeklyCashbackContent: The ‘Weekly Cashback’ is an exclusive perk on our platform designed for VIP 22+ players. As the name suggests, this bonus is issued once a week. It is an automatic bonus paid out every Friday to players at VIP level 22 and above. The size of the bonus depends on how much a player has wagered during the past week with a minimum wager requirement of $1000 between the period Friday-Thursday. The calculation for the weekly cashback remains the same, and the only difference is that it may not align with your Recharge renewals.
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus1: In addition to our existing Weekly Bonus for VIP level 22+ players, we are now introducing the BONENZA Sports Club weekly bonus as an additional perk for sports bettors. The new Sport bonus is specific only to Sport Wager and is calculated based on the player's wagering amount from Saturday to Friday, and distributed automatically every Saturday. With the introduction of the BONENZA Sports Club bonuses, our VIP level 22+ players can now enjoy even more rewards and a thrilling sports betting experience!
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus2: BONENZA Sports Club offers a range of weekend bonuses based on your weekly wager amount in our Sportsbook.
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus3: 1. Wager $500 or more from Saturday to Friday and receive a $5 Weekend Bonus!
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus4: 2. Wager $2,500 or more and receive a $30 Weekend Bonus!
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus5: 3. Wager $5,000 or more and receive a $70 Weekend Bonus!
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus6: 4. Wager $10,000 or more and receive a $150 Weekend Bonus!
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus7: These bonuses apply to all markets and odds in our Sportsbook, giving you more opportunities to win big!
vipClub.WhatWeeklyBonus8: The weekly wager is calculated from the previous Saturday 00:00hrs to Friday 23:59hrs (UTC).
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest1: The contest prize pool closely depends on the bankroll, the more players bet the bigger it grows. Current prize pool will be showed on the Contest page.
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest2: 10 most wagering players carve up the prize pool.
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest3: This Contest support wagering in : ETH, BNB, MATIC, USDT, LTC, WBTC, USDC, DOGE, SHIB, XRP, DAI
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest4: You can wager in any cryptocurrencies above, and they all will be switched to USDT at the current rate.
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest5: All prizes will be sent in USDT.
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest6: Prizes will be sent on Notice page as the Contest ends.
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest7: BONENZA reserves the right to exclude players who have violated our rules at any stage of the Contest.
vipClub.rulesDailyWageringContest8: BONENZA reserves the right to change any rules and conditions at its sole discretion and without prior notice.

vipClub.prizePool2: 2nd place – 25% of the Daily Contest prize pool
vipClub.prizePool3: 3rd place – 12% of the Daily Contest prize pool

vipClub.prizePool6: 6th place – 1.5% of the Daily Contest prize pool
vipClub.prizePool7: 7th place – 0.9% of the Daily Contest prize pool
vipClub.prizePool8: 8th place – 0.7% of the Daily Contest prize pool
vipClub.prizePool9: 9th place – 0.5% of the Daily Contest prize pool
vipClub.prizePool10: 10th place – 0.4% of the Daily Contest prize pool

privacy.cookiePolicy1: Why do we use cookies on BONENZA?
privacy.cookiePolicy2: BONENZA uses two types of cookies: cookies set by us and cookies set by third parties (i.e. other websites or services). BONENZA cookies enable us to keep you signed in to your account throughout your visit and to tailor the information displayed on the site to your preferences.
privacy.cookiePolicy3: What cookies do we use on BONENZA?
privacy.cookiePolicy4: A cookie is a piece of information in the form of a very small text file that is placed on an internet user's computer. It is generated by a web page server (which is basically the computer that operates the website) and can be used by that server whenever the user visits the site. A cookie can be thought of as an internet user's identification card, which tells a website when the user has returned. Cookies can't harm your computer and we don't store any personally identifiable information about you on any of our cookies.
privacy.cookiePolicy6: _t - stores timestamp when user firstly visited site in current browsing session. Needed for unique visits statistic. Lifetime: browsing session.
privacy.cookiePolicy7: _r - stores http referrer for current browsing session. Needed in order to external track traffic sources. Lifetime: browsing session.
privacy.cookiePolicy8: _c - stores identifier of affiliate campaign. Needed for affiliate statistic. Lifetime: forever.
privacy.cookiePolicy9: Cookies set by third parties for wildcard domain: *.BONENZA
privacy.cookiePolicy13: Please keep in mind that some browsers (i.e. chrome on mac) keep background processes running even if no tabs opened due to this session cookies may left set between sessions.
privacy.cookiePolicy14: There are also cookies set by third party scripts to their domains.
privacy.cookiePolicy15: How can I manage my cookies on BONENZA?
privacy.cookiePolicy16: If you wish to stop accepting cookies, you can do so through the Privacy Settings option in your browser.

privacy.protectionPolicy5: All http/s services work over Cloudflare;
privacy.protectionPolicy9: Server have firewall and allowed only SSH port;
privacy.protectionPolicy12: When BONENZA will be made aware of personal data breaches we will notify relevant users in accordance with GDPR timeframes.

privacy.technicalIssues1: Although we try to do our best, problems could occur now and then. Our team will do everything we could to solve your problems as soon as possible. To assist you quicker, You can join us by clicking the button above to join the telegram group.

privacy.collectingAndUsing: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
privacy.personalData1: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
privacy.usageData1: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.
privacy.usageData2: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacy.usageData3: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

privacy.information: Information from Third-Party Social Media Services
privacy.information1: BONENZA allows You to create an account and log in to use the Service through the following Third-party Social Media Services:
privacy.information2: If You decide to register through or otherwise grant us access to a Third-Party Social Media Service, We may collect Personal data that is already associated with Your Third-Party Social Media Service's account, such as Your name, Your email address, Your activities or Your contact list associated with that account.

If You choose to provide such information and Personal Data, during registration or otherwise, You are giving BONENZA permission to use, share, and store it in a manner consistent with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.deletePersonalData1: You can request to have your personal data deleted if BONENZA no longer have a legal reason to continue to process or store it. Please note that this right is not guaranteed - in the sense that BONENZA do not have the ability to comply with your request if it is subject to a legal obligation to store your data. You can request the deletion of your personal data by sending an email to support@bonenza

contentTen.title: What games can you find in a crypto casino?
contentTen.textContent1: What makes the best user experience for an online gambling site is what games you can find at the casino. A player needs to be able to find a few to choose from, and it needs to be some kind of balance to keep the market open for more than one type of player.
contentTen.textContent2: Online slots are the absolute favorite among the players on the market, and let us just tell you a bit of what you can expect from an online slot machine on a crypto gambling site.
contentTen.textContent3: Any game on a slot machine will be completely random, just like tossing coins. The computer program that controls the game selects a random symbol on the first row, then the second. Payback is the percentage of money paid back to the player on average. Each spin on the game has the same chance of winning or losing as the previous game; it has nothing to say how long since the last jackpot was paid out or whether the slot machine is 'hot' or 'cold.'
contentTen.textContent4: In the 80s, slot machines became very popular and even surpassed table games such as craps and blackjack. Slot machines and video poker now make up more than 70 percent of the casinos' profits. Now that we have gone online, it continues to profit from online crypto and bitcoin casinos and the casinos that don't accept the crypto methods. This is for a simple reason: big jackpots. When slot machines were digitized, it became possible to make the jackpot win less frequent, which also meant that the jackpot on online slot machines became larger when you first won it. And players love big jackpots! If you play for 5 dollars on a blackjack table, you can win a maximum of 7.5 dollars, but if you play with 3 dollars on a slot machine, you can win several thousand or millions of dollars in one go, but this is only if you are lucky. As we said before, you have to always look at casino games as entertainment and not a quick payday.
contentTen.textContent5: But despite their popularity, there are three major problems with playing slot machines versus table games. First of all, casinos are not always open about the odds they place on each game, and this means that it is difficult to know how likely it is to win. Second, no matter what these secret odds are, they are often wrong and worse than table games such as craps, baccarat, and blackjack. Thirdly, slot machines run much faster than other games, and thus you can lose a lot of money in a short amount of time.
contentTen.textContent6: Table games are the next big thing on online casinos, so let's talk about what you can expect from this type of game and give you newbies out there a chance to quickly learn before they buy bitcoin to spend their hard-earned money on online slots and other games for a quick payout.
contentTen.textContent7: Most casinos offer table games, and if you play at a casino that does not have them, you should consider finding another casino that offers this.
contentTen.textContent8: You do not have to play for money to play table games. Many casinos offer free play or demo play, so you do not deposit real money. In the long run, this may get a little boring, but there are full opportunities to deposit cash at a later date.
contentTen.textContent9: How much you bet on a table game is up to you, but it is often a minimum bet to participate. This varies with the different casino sites, so feel free to check out yourself when you have found a casino that you will play at.
contentTen.textContent10: Online Blackjack, also called twenty-one, is a table game most people associate with the casino. Nowadays, you can play blackjack at home in the living room, as long as you connect online and make a deposit at a casino. All the primary providers of casinos have blackjack in their portfolio.
contentTen.textContent11: Online Poker is an exciting card game that suits most people. It takes time to become good at poker, and there has been a lot of discussion about whether poker is a game of skill. Here, there are conflicting opinions from the poker industry and authorities. The poker industry, for its part, believes that it is a game of skill. At the same time, the authorities see poker as a game under the Lottery Act and are more about luck than skill.
contentTen.textContent12: Video Poker was early to be digital, so it was one of the first games you could play without having to hold cards in your hand. Video poker is almost always based on regular poker, where you play with the top five cards in your hand.
contentTen.textContent13: Jacks, or better, is a common form of video poker. Here you win money as soon as you have a pair of jacks or better.
contentTen.textContent14: In roulette, you can bet on combinations, single numbers, colors, rows, and whether the ball lands on odd or even numbers. The payout amount varies according to what you bet on. For even numbers and odd numbers, the payout sum is 1 to 1, which applies to red or black.
contentTen.textContent15: There is also a different range you can bet on here. The payout varies depending on which field you choose.
contentTen.textContent16: Craps is a dice game where a player bets on the outcome of two dice. It sounds pretty simple but probably needs some explanation to understand how to play the game. The advantage of craps is that only dice are required to play, so you can easily play craps as long as you have two dice.
contentTen.textContent17: If you have been to a casino, you know how it feels. Live casino gives you a bit of the same feeling. In some of the casinos, you have the opportunity to chat with the host along the way. It provides excitement, joy, and maybe a little frustration to play live casino, depending on the game's result.
contentTen.textContent18: If you want to play live casino, you must register with one of the gaming providers that offer this. It is easy to register with a foreign gaming company, and you only fill in with information about yourself. After this, you deposit bitcoin or another form of real money and start playing.
contentTen.textContent19: Casino players expect the casino to offer live casinos. It is so common to play live casinos that all casinos should have this in their range.
contentTen.textContent20: There are several types of live casino games you can play online, and roulette and blackjack are the most common forms of live casinos. But there are also games like Monopoly, and you will become a millionaire and spin wheels you can play live.
contentTen.textContent21: The selection of games is usually massive, but you need to know that it varies from casino to casino, so you will not always wind the same crypto casino games on different crypto casino sites. This is why we told you when giving you tips for what casinos to play, or not what casinos to play, but how to find the perfect casino for you to look at the games you can find on the casino.
contentTen.textContent22: And remember to check out what kind of bonuses you can get. Not all casinos give you a deposit bonus, but they will provide you with the reload bonuses. So, you can find reload bonuses and no deposit bonus if you don't check good enough before you start. And if you are lucky, you can find casinos that give away daily cashback.

tournament.tournamentDescription: Fight for the Top Winner Ranking to share a 10,000 USDT prize pool! Overlay up to 10,000,000 USDT! Depends on competitors.
tournament.eligibilityDescription1: To be eligible to register, you must have a balance of $100 USDT in your Bonenza Account. Illegal program users, institutional users, and hacking users are not eligible.
tournament.eligibilityDescription2: To be eligible, players who have achieved a balance of $100 USDT can participate in all competitions for free at any time.
tournament.conditions1: Participants must click the "Register Now" button during the event period to be eligible for all rewards.
tournament.terms2: Included Products for Prize Pool Calculation
tournament.conditions2: The calculation of Profit and Loss (PnL) for this event includes event tokens and actions on the event screen only. Trading volumes from general live casino and slot betting will not be considered.
tournament.conditions3: Only PnL accumulated after registering for the event will be considered. Eligible PnL will be determined based on the PnL generated during the event period.
tournament.conditions4: To qualify for a share of the PnL Prize Pool, participants must achieve VIP2 level.
tournament.conditions5: Rebuying is allowed up to 10 times per user.
tournament.conditions6: Participants' rankings will be updated after each round.
tournament.conditions7: Live rankings change only during the competition period.
tournament.conditions8: If two participants accumulate the same PnL, the final ranking will be determined based on the number of rebuy-in. If the number of rebuy-in is also the same, the prize for that rank will be added together and equally distributed.
tournament.conditions9: Each Bonenza account can participate in only one event with a single account during the same period. If the same individual participates with multiple accounts, all rewards will be forfeited.
tournament.conditions10: Rewards will be sent to eligible recipients' accounts within one day of the ranking results announcement.
tournament.conditions11: Players can purchase additional chip buy-ins at any time during the competition.
tournament.conditions12: Rebuy-in is allowed until 30 minutes before the event ends.
tournament.conditions13: 70% of rebuy-in amount will be credited directly to the prize pool. (ex. gurantee 10,000 USDT + 70% Overlay 90,000 USDT = total 100,000 USDT prize pool)
tournament.conditions14: All participants must strictly adhere to Bonenza's Terms of Service. Bonenza reserves the right to disqualify any participants who engage in dishonest or malicious activities.
tournament.conditions15: Bonenza reserves the right to modify the terms of this event without prior notice.
tournament.conditions16: Bonenza reserves the right of final interpretation of this event. If you have any questions, please contact our Customer Support.
